Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It's mine to use and prioritises checking my work and answering my questions, whereas a teacher has a whole class to address.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt encouraged by AI as I find teacher feedback has an element of negativity/feeling like I will never get my work perfect.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: It's fast and addresses all my concerns in writing.
